##    Arithematic Operations

Below is the set of some arithematic operations in R.

```{r cars}
x = 20
y = 5
x+y
x-y
x*y
x/y
sqrt(x)
x^y
exp(x)
log(x, base=exp(1))
log10(x)
help("log") # Utilizing R Help
factorial(x)
cos(x)
abs(x)

```
